## Problem 1

```{r}
library(tidyverse)

set.seed(10)

iris_with_missing = iris %>% 
  map_df(~replace(.x, sample(1:150, 20), NA)) %>%
  mutate(Species = as.character(Species))
```

**The fuction**

```{r}
fill_missing = function(x) {
  
  if (!is.numeric(x)) {
    x[is.na(x)] = "virginica"
  }
  
  x[is.na(x)] = mean(x, na.rm = TRUE)
  
  x
  
}
```

**Apply the fuction**

```{r}
output = map_dfr(iris_with_missing, fill_missing)
```
